decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1755/EX/001, 1755/EX/002, 1755/EX/003, 1755/EX/004, 1755/EX/005, 1755/EX/006, 1755/EX/007, 1755/EX/008, 1755/P/100, 1755/P/101, 1755/P/102, 1755/P/103, 1755/P/105, 1755/P/106, Flood Risk Assessment dated 18/04/2018 from Three Counties Flood Risk Assessment, Construction Method Statement dated April 2018 Ref: J001011 from Green Structural Engineering Ltd., received: 10/05/2018. 1755/EX/009 received: 15/05/2018. 1755/EX/010, 1755/EX/011, 1755/P/104 Rev A, 1755/P/107 Rev A, 1755/P/108, 1755/P/109, 1755/P/110, received: 06/06/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The basement shall not be converted into a separate dwelling or for the use as sleeping accommodation.
Condition : 7 - The construction shall be carried out in accordance with the Construction Method Statement submitted and approved with this application.
Condition : 8 - The development shall conform to the Flood Risk Assessment submitted and approved with this application.

Condition : 9 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
description: Creation of a basement extension and enlargement the existing roof extension to provide access to the roof terrace
